OOC: Yeah, Slaughter actually ended up getting Gangon killed when he was Sk=
ulletron, because he made BrightBlade love this other guy, and Gangon was s=
o shocked that he was easily caught. He ended up in prison until Klant shot=
 him and killed him...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: LurkerAbyss=
 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, June 10, 2001 12:25 AM
  Su=
bject: I Hope You're Prepared.......


  OOC: Wow, you guys really don't li=
ke organics!  Well, wait till you see something you probably forgot about t=
hat Skulletron had......And R.Dahl, you weren't around when Skulletron was =
here, so this should be a nice surprise.....And if you don't get it, ask so=
mebody, like Yanshosh, who was here for it, and who actually had it used on=
 Zardus.  And when I was a cheap-ass and used it to "control" the CF....(I =
still regret that to this very day.)
   
  IC: Slaughter got a look of disg=
ust on his face when he found that Motormaster wasn't very edible, which is=
 kind of hard to believe, considering how disgusting Slaughter's face alrea=
dy is.  He felt Motormaster grab him, then suddenly a bunch of vines had hi=
m tangled again.  This left him completely vulnerable to Scourge and Godfat=
her's hits, which all made contact with him.  Slime and some flesh flew eve=
rywhere as the hits slammed into Slaughter's body.
   
        "RRRGGGHHAAA=
AA!!!!!!!" Slaughter yelled in sheer pain.
   
        Slaughter decided to=
 do something he hadn't done since he was Skulletron...........Slaughter pr=
epared to connect his mind with Motormaster's......
   
  OOC: Ok,  would s=
omebody else like the honours of explaining Skullet-er-Slaughter's mind abi=
lity?
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Alloran2@... 
    To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, June 09, 2001 10:04 PM
    Sub=
ject: Re: More Slaughter!


    :::Godfather/Scourge::: 

    ::Godfather f=
ires 8 shots from his pistol at at Slaughter:: 
    ~~~~~ 
    ::Scourge fi=
res 25 rapid laser blasts at Slaughter::
